alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Harlan; Kearney; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 8:40PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Smith, northeastern Phillips, western Franklin, southeastern Phelps, southwestern Kearney and eastern Harlan Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 840 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Naponee, or 25 miles northeast of Phillipsburg, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Republican City around 845 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hildreth, Ragan and Wilcox. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
